meta.job_title: Test Environments, Manufacturing Engineer /Fabrication Shop Lead

duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyzes and modifies product designs in collaboration with Design Engineering to assure manufacturability.
Determine and direct technical matters required to make a given product according to the desired volume, timetable, cost, quality level, and other required specifications.

Manage all aspects of fabrication, including safe equipment operation, part inspection, managing the machinist’s workload, supporting customers’ schedules, delegating, and coordinating workflow as required.
Plan and oversee the fabrication of raw materials, creating manufacturing travelers, and identifying needed tooling and fixtures.

Collaborate with support technicians, engineers, technical leads, and other shop sites to successfully meet the prototype development and test manufacturing needs of internal and external program customers.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics (STEM)
